Documentation

Welcome to the Microclimate product documentation. In this documentation you can find detailed instructions on how to complete the tasks that you need to perform to install and use Microclimate.

If you’re just looking for some pointers, look through the following links. If you can’t find what you need, reach out to us at our ibm-cloud-tech Slack channel! If you are new to Slack you can create a user ID here!

Hitting a problem? Start with our troubleshooting page to see if it is something we are aware of. If you don’t see your issue there, you can log an issue in our GitHub repository.
